text: ‘‘granthadavare, nam'ma mattu nim'ma naduve samanavagiruva ansadedege banniri. Navu allahana horatu berarannu pujisadirona mattu yarannu avana jote palugolisadirona. Hageye nam'malli yaru allahana horatu bere yarannu devarugalagisabaradu’’ endu heliri. Istagiyu avaru hathamaritanavanne toridare, ‘‘nivu saksigalagiri, navantu khandita muslimaragiruvevu (allahanige saranagiruvevu)’’ endu ghosisiri
